text: Christian Ward (born September 9, 1986), better known by his stage name Hitmaka (used to be Yung Berg) is a rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer from Chicago. He's best known for the song "Sexy Lady" with Junior. He was featured in the song "Sexy Can I" by Ray J. ==Reference== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:African-American musicians Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:Rappers from Illinois
title: Yung Berg
